attributes.title: How To Manifest The Best Things In Life
attributes.description:
28 NOVEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG 

*I WILL EXPAND ON ALCHEMISTRY OF ESHWARA SHAKTI - ULTIMATE CONSCIOUS FORCE. ONE OF THE GREATEST THINGS ABOUT THE ESHWARA SHAKTI IS NOT ONLY IT IS THE SUPREME FORCE, BUT THE OTHER FORCES LIKE GRAVITY, ELECTROMAGNETISM, WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE, STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE - ALL OTHER HARD POWERS OR FORCES, IN WHATEVER QUANTITY THEY MAY BE, ESHWARA SHAKTI CAN NULLIFY, PLAY WITH, CHANGE ALL OR ANY OF THEM TO ANYTHING AND JUST LIKE THAT CAN SUPERCEDE ANYTHING. 

*EVEN MANIFESTING A LITTLE BIT OF ESHWARA SHAKTI, DOING SMALL SIMPLE INITIATION LEVEL POWER MANIFESTATION LIKE MOVING AN OBJECT OR THIRD EYE POWER, REMOVES ALL FEARS FROM YOU. 

*NEITHER HARD POWER, NOR BLACK MAGIC CAN EVER WIN OR GIVE A TOUGH FIGHT TO SOFT POWER. PURE DIVINE SOFT POWER IS FAR MORE SUPERIOR THAN ANY ORDINARY IMAGINATION. 

*WHEN YOU TASTE ESHWARA SHAKTI, THE FIRST AND FOREMOST HAPPENING IN YOU IS: ALL FEARS SIMPLY JUST DISAPPEAR. YOU WILL STRATEGIZE AND PLAN BUT YOU KNOW THOROUGHLY KALABHAIRAVA IS PROTECTING YOU. PARAMASHIVA’S BLESSINGS IS  WITH YOU. WITH THEIR PROTECTION, BLESSING AND GUIDANCE, THEY WILL BE EXECUTING MORE THAN ANYTHING THAT YOU CAN IMAGINE. 

*THE ENLIGHTENMENT SCIENCE HAS MULTI DIMENSIONAL KNOWLEDGE AND SCIENCE - JNANA AND VIJNANA. IN THE FIELD OF ART, MUSIC, METALLURGY, KNOWLEDGE, IN THE FIELD OF WORKING ON BIO ENERGY, IN MULTIPLE SUCH FIELDS. DOWNLOADING THIS SCIENCE AND MAKING  IT AS REALITY IN ME, MANIFESTING IT AS A CLEAR SYSTEMATIC REPRODUCIBLE SCIENCE TO ALL OF YOU - WHATEVER IS NEEDED, KALABHAIRAVA IS PERFECTLY PROVIDING. 

*I CAN GIVE YOU THOUSANDS OF SUCH INCIDENTS, BUT FINAL CONCLUSION IS: THE ULTIMATE POWER, ESHWARA SHAKTI, WHEN YOU RECEIVE BY COGNIZING ULTIMATE COGNITION AND MANIFEST THEM AS ULTIMATE FORCE IN YOUR LIFE - ESHWARA SHAKTI,YOU MANIFEST ALL THE BEST THINGS IN YOUR LIFE. 

*ONCE MY GURU ISAKKI SWAMIGAL WAS SITTING IN PADMASANA IN A CORNER OF THE SMALL BUILDING WHERE HE WAS STAYING. I HAVE SEEN HIM FOR YEARS BUT NEVER SEEN HIM EATING. VERY RARELY HE EATS. MAYBE ONCE IN 5 - 10 YEARS. HE IS NOT A REGULAR EATER. SOMEBODY BROUGHT SOME FOOD AND HE PUT A LITTLE IN HIS MOUTH AND SWALLOWED, AND SAT IN SAMADHI. FROM THE CORNER OF HIS MOUTH, SALIVA WAS POURING. I BROUGHT A SMALL CLOTH AND STARTED CLEANING. HE OPENED HIS EYES AND WITH JOY AND BLISS, HE BLESSED ME. I KNOW FOR SURE HE IS IN SOME ECSTASY AND IN A DIFFERENT SPACE. I ASKED HIM CASUALLY, “HOW ARE YOU FEELING?” HE WAS VERY SWEET AND NAUGHTY, TEASING, “BY MIXING DIFFERENT LIQUOR, ARTIFICIAL LIQUOR AND NATURAL LIQUOR FROM THE PALM TREE, IF SOMEONE DRINKS, HOW IT FEELS, THIS IS BEYOND ANY OF THAT! THAT IS THE WAY SAMADHI FEELS!” 

*HE MADE A FURTHER BEAUTIFUL STATEMENT ABOUT SAMADHI: THE ESHWARA SHAKTI MANIFESTING IN ONE BODY IN SAMADHI, UNCLUTCHED SPACE CAN NULLIFY MILLIONS AND MILLIONS OF PEOPLE’S NEGATIVITY. HE SAID, “EVEN IF FEW THOUSANDS OF US, MY WHOLE NITHYANANDA SANGA, IF WE ALL SIT IN THE SPACE OF UNCLUTCHING AND MEDITATE, WE CAN NULLIFY ALL THE COLLECTIVE NEGATIVITY OF THE WHOLE EARTH.” BECAUSE THE POWER OF ESHWARA SHAKTI IS VERY QUALITATIVELY FROM A DIFFERENT HIGHER SPACE THAN ANY OF THESE HARD POWERS. 

*THIS IS THE STATEMENT YOU HAVE TO INTERNALISE. THIS IS THE POWERFUL COGNITION FOR TODAY’S SATSANG: ALCHEMISTRY OF THE ESHWARA SHAKTI IN ONE BODY, IF YOU RECEIVE THE POWERFUL COGNITIONS PRESENTED IN VEDA-VEDANTA, AGAMA-AGAMANTA... OUR NITHYANANDA SANGA IS CENTERED ON VEDA - VEDANTA AND AGAMA-AGAMANTA. VEDA-VEDANTA IS NOT THE END OF VEDANTA BUT BEST OF VEDANTA. SAME WAY, AGAMA-AGAMANTA IS NOT THE END OF AGAMANTA, BUT THE BEST OF AGAMANTA. SO EVEN IF ONE PERSON POWERFULLY COGNISES THE POWERFUL COGNITIONS DECLARED IN VEDA AND VEDANTA, AGAMA AND AGAMANTA, MANIFESTS THE ESHWARA SHAKTI, HE CAN JUST DESTROY MILLIONS OF PEOPLE’S NEGATIVITY.
